participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Introverted and reflective, Emily finds solace in nature and enjoys moments of solitude.
participant_1.background: I'm an adult who likes to have some time to myself. My feet hurt after long runs in my boots. I'm not sure if I'll be programming this weekend, but I'll definitely be enjoying my morning coffee. I took my dogs for a walk in the woods and saw a deer. I’m dumpy.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Jake is cheerful and optimistic, but he tends to avoid large crowds and prefers intimate gatherings.
participant_2.background: My worst experience was when I was in a car accident and my family and I were all injured. I like to stay away from big crowds, so Comic Con isn't my thing. I hate the taste of fish. I am really short. I am a happy person.

content.text: Hello, I'm doing well, thank you! How about yourself?
I'm doing well, thanks for asking! I just got back from a walk in the woods with my dogs, and we saw a deer! It was so cool.
Wow, that's awesome! I love nature, but I'm not sure I'd be brave enough to go for a walk in the woods alone. I'm short and a bit on the chunky side, so I'm not exactly a natural outdoorswoman.
Haha, I'm not exactly the most graceful person either, but I love the peace and quiet of the woods. It's a great place to relax and clear your head.
I can definitely see the appeal of that. I'm sure it would be really therapeutic.
It is. I'm so glad I went today.
I'm glad you had a good time!
I'm going to go get some coffee now. Do you want some?
That sounds great! I'll come with you.
